fields.name: text
fields.fieldText: You can upload photos at the end of the form.

fields.name: Photo_List
fields.fieldText:
Please consider taking photos of the following points:

  • Building
  • Roof
  • Water ponding
  • Internal roof
  • Roof panel
  • Ingress degradation of internal roof finish
  • Signs of rust staining
  • Cracking/spalling of the internal surface of the roof
  • Cracking at the supports
  • Deflection of the roof panels
  • Chamfer
  • Bubbles
  • Screwdriver test area
